page.title: 20ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: Area has one Pub _ White Hart, Ludford dating from 1740. Provides bar lunches & evening meals, has restaurant and accommodation. Pub Darts team and hosts Football Club meetings, Whist Drives, Coffee Mornings &c for Charity Practically every house has Television and an increasing number have Video & Music Systems. Nearest professional Theatre at Lincoln with amateurs at Louth & Wickenby. Playing Field and Village Hall are in next Grid area. Nearest Cinema at Louth. Concerts in Louth, Lincoln, Grimsby nd good Jazz Club in Louth.
